professional_summary: IT professional with several years of experience in database administration and management. Skilled in performance tuning, high availability, disaster recovery, and large-scale enterprise solutions. Prior experience includes customer service, cash handling, and general office tasks. Seeking a fulfilling employment opportunity as a long-term team member.

key_responsibilities: Worked extensively with large-scale enterprise solutions including VLDB environments.
Demonstrated skill in performance tuning and optimization using Clustering
Supported a complex strategy for automatically refreshing stage environments using custom log shipping and SAN snapshots from replicated production servers.
Installed and configured SQL Server 2000 and 2005.
Performed standard SQL Server configuration activities including transfer logins
Worked extensively on the rollout of SQL Server 2005 for core Online server complexes in a 7x24 environment.
Sold financial services products and achieved high sales targets.
Supervised vault activities and managed cash transactions.
Overseered teller operations and ensured compliance with banking regulations.
